purpose: Provide a clear standard for audit logging, evidence retention, and chain of custody for WyneOS v1.0.

logTypes.evolution: Emergent behaviour and Phase 9 evolution entries.
logTypes.assembly: System assembly logs and operational events.

chainOfCustody.principle: Logs and evidence must remain traceable from creation to review.
requirements: No direct modification permitted after creation.
Any rotation or archive must preserve original timestamps.
integrityControls: Integrity seals protect core evidence files.
Hashing may be applied for additional assurance.

retentionPolicy.minimumRetention: Logs retained for a minimum of one year.
retentionPolicy.extendedRetention: Critical evidence kept for the full lifecycle of version 1.x.
retentionPolicy.archiveLocation: Archived logs stored securely within system/audit/archive if created.

reviewProcess.governanceReview: Policy engine may request log inspection if anomalies detected.
reviewProcess.manualAudit: Authorised personnel may review logs for operational or compliance checks.

prohibitedActions: Deletion of active logs without proper rotation.
Manual editing of any audit files.

complianceStatus.notes: Current logs and seals meet the defined audit and evidence requirements for WyneOS v1.0.
